name: cbv2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w2, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) Format hypotheses to common style. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2018.)
